name: Red Moss
description:
This game is in Japanese. I am waiting for a person who makes translation so that more gamers can enjoy it.

-- Method of operation --

Z/Enter/Space: Decide/Action
X/Esc: Cancel/Back
Arrow: Move
F12: Back to Title (no save)

-- ENDINGS --

There are 4 kinds of endings

-- Video Policy --

Please be sure to write the name of the author and the title of the work.

(Also, please cooperate with the donation.)

More Details (Japanese): https://had2apps.com/games/rule_video
